name: Neiro on Tron
description: Neiro is the newest star on the TRON blockchain, following in the footsteps of the Neiro project on Ethereum. As the official sister of $DOGE, she brings the same playful energy and is ready to make a big impact in the crypto space. Inspired by the original Neiro on Ethereum, this new chapter on TRON was launched by her creator, who keeps fans updated with fun insights through a blog. With a loyal and growing community, Neiro is already gaining recognition in the digital world. Her mission is to unite crypto enthusiasts and strengthen the community spirit within the TRON network.
